commandDescription: retrieve and refresh org metadata to local directory (i.e. retrieve all or filtered metadata from org)
ignorebackupFlagDescription: flag to ignore creating a local backup of retrieved files
ignoreinstalledFlagDescription: flag to ignore retrieving installed (or managed) package files (excludes all installed package metadata)
ignorenamespacesFlagDescription: flag to ignore retrieving namespace prefixed package files (excludes all namespaced metadata)
ignorehiddenFlagDescription: (Recommended) flag to ignore retrieving hidden or non-editable managed files such as managed ApexClasses
ignorefoldersFlagDescription: flag to ignore retrieving folders e.g. email, reports, dashboards and documents
ignorestaticresourcesFlagDescription: flag to ignore retrieving all static resources
manifestonlyFlagDescription: flag to only create manifest/package.xml and doesn't download metadata files
stagemodeFlagDescription: stage mode e.g. stage/<alias>/retrieved/src (default is false), otherwise dev mode (default is true) e.g. src
splitFlagDescription: flag to split package.xml into package1.xml and package2.xml in attempt to address 10000 file download limit per request
containsFiltersFlagDescription: filters (case sensitive) for meta components containing text e.g. -r ABC_,Xyz,"One Two"
startsWithFiltersFlagDescription: filters (case sensitive) for meta components such as lwc starting with text e.g. -w xyz
endsWithFiltersFlagDescription: filters (case sensitive) for meta components such as custom metadata items ending with with text e.g. -j __c
includeTypesFiltersFlagDescription: include type filters (case sensitive and whole type names) for meta types e.g. Settings
excludeTypesFiltersFlagDescription: overriding exclude type filters (case sensitive and whole type names) for meta types e.g. CustomIndex
createcsvFlagDescription: flag to create csv file to more easily compare metadata items in excel
